theory: ğŸ”´ Heaven bead (bead above the bar) has value = 5
ğŸŸ¡ Earth beads (beads below the bar) have value = 1
ğŸ“ Beads are only counted when touching the bar
ğŸ‘† Push Heaven bead down = add 5, push up = subtract 5
ğŸ‘‡ Push Earth bead up = add 1, push down = subtract 1
practice: Try pushing 1 Earth bead up to the bar to make number 1!
Push 2 Earth beads up to the bar to make number 2!
Push 3 Earth beads up to the bar to make number 3!
Push 4 Earth beads up to the bar to make number 4!
Push Heaven bead down to the bar to make number 5!

theory: ğŸŸ¡ **Earth beads** are the 4 beads below the bar
ğŸ”¢ Each Earth bead has value = **1**
ğŸ“ Push Earth beads **up** to the bar = add that value
ğŸ“ Push Earth beads **down** away from bar = subtract that value
âœ¨ Numbers 1-4 only use Earth beads
ğŸ”´ **Heaven bead** is the single bead above the bar
ğŸ“ Push Heaven bead **down** to bar = add 5
ğŸ“ Push Heaven bead **up** away from bar = subtract 5
ğŸ’¡ Number 5 = only Heaven bead touching bar
ğŸ’¡ Numbers 6-9 = Heaven bead + Earth beads
ğŸ’¡ Number 10 = 1 Earth bead in Tens column
ğŸ’¡ Number 23 = 2 in Tens + 3 in Units
âœ¨ Addition = Push more beads toward the bar
ğŸ‘† 1+1: Have 1 bead, push 1 more = 2 beads
ğŸ‘† 2+1: Have 2 beads, push 1 more = 3 beads
ğŸ‘† 1+2: Have 1 bead, push 2 more = 3 beads
ğŸ’¡ Only works when you have enough Earth beads to push!
ğŸ”´ When result â‰¥ 5, use the Heaven bead
ğŸ‘‡ 5+1: Already have Heaven, push 1 Earth = 6
ğŸ‘‡ 5+2: Already have Heaven, push 2 Earth = 7
ğŸ’¡ Heaven bead helps represent numbers 5-9!
1ï¸âƒ£ Enough Earth beads â†’ Push more Earth beads up
2ï¸âƒ£ Need â‰¥5 â†’ Push Heaven bead down
ğŸŒŸ SMALL FRIENDS are two numbers that add up to 5
ğŸ’¡ When not enough Earth beads to add, use Small Friends!
ğŸ¯ Formula: +N = +5 - Small Friend of N
ğŸ¯ When out of Earth beads, use Small Friends formula:
â• +4 = Push Heaven down, remove 1 Earth (+5-1)
â• +3 = Push Heaven down, remove 2 Earth (+5-2)
â• +2 = Push Heaven down, remove 3 Earth (+5-3)
â• +1 = Push Heaven down, remove 4 Earth (+5-4)
ğŸ“Œ See +4 when have 1,2,3 Earth â†’ Push Heaven, remove 1
ğŸ“Œ See +3 when have 2,3,4 Earth â†’ Push Heaven, remove 2
ğŸ“Œ See +2 when have 3,4 Earth â†’ Push Heaven, remove 3
ğŸ¯ Goal: React instantly, no thinking needed!
âœ¨ Subtraction = Push beads away from the bar
ğŸ‘‡ Subtract Earth beads: Push Earth beads down (away from bar)
ğŸ‘† Subtract Heaven bead: Push Heaven bead up (away from bar)
ğŸ”¢ Example: 4-2 = Have 4 Earth, push 2 down = 2 left
ğŸ’¡ Only works when you have enough beads to remove!
ğŸ¯ When not enough Earth beads to subtract, use Small Friends:
â– -4 = Push Heaven up, add 1 Earth (-5+1)
â– -3 = Push Heaven up, add 2 Earth (-5+2)
â– -2 = Push Heaven up, add 3 Earth (-5+3)
â– -1 = Push Heaven up, add 4 Earth (-5+4)
ğŸ“Œ See -4 when have Heaven â†’ Push Heaven up, add 1 Earth
ğŸ“Œ See -3 when have Heaven â†’ Push Heaven up, add 2 Earth
ğŸ“Œ See -2 when have Heaven â†’ Push Heaven up, add 3 Earth
ğŸ“Œ See -1 when have Heaven â†’ Push Heaven up, add 4 Earth
âœ¨ **TO ADD:** Borrow 5, return Small Friend
âœ¨ **TO SUBTRACT:** Add Small Friend, return 5
ğŸŒŸ BIG FRIENDS are two numbers that add up to 10
ğŸ¯ When adding goes past 9, carry to tens column!
â• +9 = Add 1 ten, subtract Big Friend of 9 (+10-1)
â• +8 = Add 1 ten, subtract Big Friend of 8 (+10-2)
â• +7 = Add 1 ten, subtract Big Friend of 7 (+10-3)
ğŸ’¡ Formula: +N = +10 - Big Friend of N
ğŸ“Œ See +9 â†’ Carry to tens, remove 1
ğŸ“Œ See +8 â†’ Carry to tens, remove 2
ğŸ“Œ See +7 â†’ Carry to tens, remove 3
ğŸ“Œ See +6 â†’ Carry to tens, remove 4
ğŸ¯ Practice until it becomes automatic!
ğŸ¯ When not enough beads to subtract, borrow from tens!
â– -9 = Borrow 1 ten, add Big Friend of 9 (-10+1)
â– -8 = Borrow 1 ten, add Big Friend of 8 (-10+2)
â– -7 = Borrow 1 ten, add Big Friend of 7 (-10+3)
ğŸ’¡ Formula: -N = -10 + Big Friend of N
ğŸ¯ Subtracting across ten - special cases:
ğŸ“Œ See -9 â†’ Borrow ten, add 1
ğŸ“Œ See -8 â†’ Borrow ten, add 2
ğŸ“Œ See -7 â†’ Borrow ten, add 3
ğŸ“Œ See -6 â†’ Borrow ten, add 4
ğŸ¯ Practice until it becomes automatic!
âœ¨ **TO ADD:** Borrow 10, return Big Friend
âœ¨ **TO SUBTRACT:** Add Big Friend, return 10
ğŸ¯ **COMBINED ADD: SMALL FRIENDS + BIG FRIENDS**
Step 2: Need to borrow 10 â†’ Add 1 (tens column)
Step 3: Return Big Friend of 8 = 2 â†’ But 6 can't subtract 2
Step 4: Use combined: Subtract 5, add Small Friend of 2 = 3
ğŸ’¡ **TIP:** When can't subtract Big Friend, subtract 5 then add Small Friend
ğŸ¯ **COMBINED SUBTRACT: SMALL FRIENDS + BIG FRIENDS**
When subtracting but can't add Big Friend directly
Step 3: Add Big Friend of 8 = 2 â†’ But can't add 2
Step 4: Use combined: Add 5, subtract Small Friend of 2 = 3
ğŸ’¡ **TIP:** Subtract 8 = subtract 10, add 5, subtract 3 (Small Friend of 2)
â€¢ Simple add: Push beads directly
â€¢ Small Friends add: Subtract 5, add Small Friend
â€¢ Big Friends add: Add 10, subtract Big Friend
â€¢ Combined add: Add 10, subtract 5, add Small Friend
â€¢ Simple subtract: Push beads away directly
â€¢ Small Friends subtract: Add 5, subtract Small Friend
â€¢ Big Friends subtract: Subtract 10, add Big Friend
â€¢ Combined subtract: Subtract 10, add 5, subtract Small Friend
ğŸ’¡ **TIP:** Practice often for natural reflexes!
â€¢ Add: Borrow larger number, return Friend
â€¢ Subtract: Add Friend, return larger number
Look at number â†’ Identify which formula â†’ Execute
ğŸ“ Always calculate from RIGHT to LEFT (units first)
ğŸ“ When units column â‰¥ 10, carry to tens!
ğŸ“ Subtraction also goes RIGHT to LEFT
ğŸ’¡ Read and push from LEFT to RIGHT!
ğŸ“ Still calculate from RIGHT to LEFT
ğŸ“ Subtract large numbers: careful when borrowing!
ğŸ”¢ Example: 2345 = 2 thousand + 3 hundred + 4 tens + 5 units
ğŸ’¡ Soroban can calculate very large numbers!
ğŸ¯ Each column works the same way
ğŸ“ Rule unchanged: RIGHT to LEFT
ğŸ“ Subtract large numbers: careful when borrowing!
ğŸ’¡ When borrowing across multiple places, subtract step by step
Process units â†’ tens â†’ hundreds
Process sequentially from right to left
â€¢ Process each place with formulas
ğŸ’¡ **TIP:** Break large numbers into easier parts
ğŸ”¹ Place multiplicand on the right
ğŸ”¹ Multiply each digit from left to right
ğŸ”¹ Add partial products to correct positions
ğŸ’¡ **TIP:** Memorize times tables for faster calculation!

Step 3: 5 Ã— 6 = 30 â†’ Add to result
ğŸ’¡ **TIP:** Multiply by 5 = multiply by 10 then divide by 2

ğŸ’¡ **TIP:** Sum of digits in 9's products always = 9

â€¢ Multiply from left to right
â€¢ Place results in correct position
ğŸ’¡ **TIP:** Estimate result first to verify
ğŸ”¹ **2-digit Ã— 1-digit:** Multiply each digit, add results
ğŸ”¹ **2-digit Ã— 2-digit:** Break apart, multiply parts
â€¢ Last digit Ã— last digit gives last digit of result
ğŸ’¡ **TIP:** Practice 10 problems daily to master!

ğŸ”¹ **2-digit divisor:** Long division, step by step
ğŸ”¹ **With remainder:** Note remainder if any
â€¢ Divisible by 2: last digit even
â€¢ Divisible by 5: last digit 0 or 5
â€¢ Divisible by 3: digit sum divisible by 3
â€¢ Divisible by 9: digit sum divisible by 9

- Anzan = mental math using virtual Soroban in your mind
- Visualize the abacus in your brain
- Multiply by 5 = divide by 2, multiply by 10
- Multiply by 4 = multiply by 2, then by 2 again
ğŸ¯ **GOAL:** Answer within 8 seconds, instant recall
- a Ã· b = c means b Ã— c = a
- Know times tables â†’ divide quickly
ğŸ¯ **GOAL:** Answer within 10 seconds, link to times tables
- Example: 56 Ã· 7 = ? â†’ 7 Ã— ? = 56 â†’ 7 Ã— 8 = 56 â†’ Answer: 8
ğŸ¯ **GOAL:** Divide by 6-9: 10 sec, large numbers: 15 sec
You've mastered mental math in Level 15-16. Now it's time to **speed up**!
- Visualize the abacus instantly in your mind
- 5 is the "anchor point" - add/subtract through 5 is faster
- Practice 5-10 minutes daily to build reflexes
Times tables must be **memorized like reflexes**!
Division is **reverse multiplication**. Know times tables = divide fast!
**Flash Anzan** starts with simple number memory!
- Number appears for **2 seconds** (decreasing to 1 second)
- You type the number you just saw
- Say number silently in your head to reinforce
This is the first step of **real Flash Anzan**!
- Numbers appear one by one (1.5 seconds each)
- ADD UP in your head as you watch
- Visualize: Push beads UP (add) or DOWN (subtract)
- Each number shows for only **0.8-1 second**
- Don't read the number - SEE THE IMAGE on the abacus
- Move beads in your head with each number
- Read result from final mental image
Welcome to the **peak of Flash Anzan**!
- Each number shows for only **0.5-0.7 seconds**
- No more thinking - just SEE and KNOW
- Persistent practice will get you there!
